description: printed in black and brown; head of a man in 3/4 view; small framed calligraphy panel attached to bottom of print's frame by chains (see Notes for text)
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Edition

on backing paper, in black ink: [Chafetz, Sidney / Robert Frost / Original block print / Gift of Mrs. Allison Bigelow / May 1964 / Not for rental. / A III]
provenance: Harry M. Drake, St. Paul; Estate of Harry M. Drake; bequeathed to MIA, 2013
signed: LLC, in pencil: [Robert Frost]; LRC in pencil: [Sidney Chafetz 1959]
title: Robert Frost
